Package enigma.console

Provides text-mode support classes, most notably Console and TextWindow.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Console A Console is a high-level text component, equivalent to an xterm window in Unix.
TextWindow A rectangular grid of characters with support for keyboard and mouse events.
 

Class Summary
DefaultConsoleImpl A concrete Console implementation which hooks up to an arbitrary TextWindow for its low-level functionality.
TextAttributes Attributes associated with a character in a TextWindow.
 

Exception Summary
TextWindowNotAvailableException Thrown to indicate that a TextWindow is not available in the current environment.
 

Package enigma.console Description

Provides text-mode support classes, most notably Console and TextWindow.
